ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Owner:User.NSA_Compliant__c <> TRUE , ISPICKVAL(Partner__r.Customer_Compliance__c, 'US_Govern'), NOT(OR( Owner:User.Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Community User Login', Owner:User.Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A non NSA Compliant User cannot own this record
